message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $17,000. It's a great deal, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product to you, but I am only willing to pay up to $15,000 for it. Would you be able to meet me halfway?

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I value your business, I can't come down to $15,000 at this point.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $16,000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to both of us.  What do you say?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still believe we can find a better solution. I would like to propose $14,000 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
